text: To won mu fee igbɛma a fanyi ra. A luxi alɔ won na won yɛtɛ matofe kike ma naxan mu igbɛma a fanyi ra. Kɔnɔ waxati na fafe, won fee igbɛma nɛ a fanyi ra, a luma nɛ alɔ won nun na fee na ti yire keren. To n mu fe birin kolon, kɔnɔ waxati na fafe, n ma fahaamui fama kamalide, n fa fe kolon alɔ Ala n kolonxi ki naxɛ.
